input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item specification:
Trophy 1st Note Kazoo

Item specifications:
Comes in Red or Blue
Made of Durable Plastic
Hum Your Favorite Tunes
Real Instrument

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Trophy 1st Note Kazoo comes in Red or Blue and is made of a durable plastic. Hum your favorite tunes with this real instrument kazoo that is sure to impress your friends!
input_text.Response B: Introducing the Trophy 1st Note Kazoo - the ultimate instrument for all aspiring musicians. With its easy-to-play design and durable plastic construction, this kazoo is perfect for kids and adults alike to Hum your favorite tunes. The Trophy 1st Note Kazoo is a real instrument, designed to produce real music. It comes in a variety of colors, so you can choose the one that best suits your style. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, the Trophy 1st Note Kazoo is the perfect tool to help you achieve your musical goals. So why wait? Get yours today!

label_annotations.feedback: A is great…B is much too long
